slide.title: Benchmarking
slide.blurb: Let's have a look at how we might benchmark and subsequently tune a PHP server.
Our test script includes 2 files, defines 3 functions, loops a bit and outputs about %6k% of data.
For testing I am using %http_load% from acme.com and the default SendBufferSize
slide.example: # To change this on Linux, cat a larger number # into /proc/sys/net/core/wmem_max in your # httpd startup script SendBufferSize 65535
